item.title: Sign Up and Get Started using Google Adwords Keyword Planner
item.description: A basic guide to signing up to AdWords Keyword Planner for the first time. Many SEO guides reference this tool, and it can be a little confusing to get started, and that’s why I created this short howto.

item.title: 100's of Mostly Free SEO Tools
item.description: All your SEO tools are belong to us! No, really! From the official tools of Google and co, limited trial power tools, analytics, link building, content creation and much more! All organized by category.

item.title: Learn SEO
item.description: The fundamental building blocks of SEO are Keyword Research, Content, Internal linking, Site Structure, and a Multitude of Technical Optimizations. Most of those optimizations revolve around gradually making every individual piece of code on your site more machine readable, to communicate with a variety of connecting sites/services and make it stand out from the crowd.
